about_the_game:
Ever wondered what it’s like to be a sausage in a museum? Now’s your chance! Take control of our oblong hero on their journey through a surreal art exhibit. Face bizarre challenges, gravity-defying sculptures, and mind-bending installations in an adventure for the most intellectual of art connoisseurs.

FACE THE MUSEUM

Encounter physics-based challenges that require patience and precision. Each move is a careful balance between progress and slipping back to the beginning of the exhibition. But every victory comes with its own delicious reward : becoming a true art connoisseur.

BE THE SAUSAGE

With controls crafted to feel immersive, you will feel like a real sausage. Every roll and flip feels organic - although the sausage is anything but. Oh yeah, and you can yeet yourself if you're willing to take risks.

If you ever wanted a game that makes fun of the pretentiousness of the contemporary art world, while you embody your favorite steamed meal, you've arrived.

Art can be challenging.

short_description: Flip-flop, roll and fling your way through a wacky art museum as a clumsy sausage on the run. Dodge weird obstacles, pull off ridiculous stunts, and try not to fall all the way down as you escape.
